name: Are you ready for the Caribean? An Experience you will never Forget!!!!
description: Enjoy a calm and relaxing Glass bottom boat ride to Buccoo Reef and the Nylon Pool. You will have an opportunity to swim at the Nylon Pool and Snorkel at Buccoo Reef;  and Argyle Waterfall, the highest waterfall in Tobago, and the facilities and guides available on site make it very attractive to visitors. Two days of perfect combination between adventure and fun of the Caribbean flavor.
